Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': It was 30 meters long, shaped approximately like the Aurebesh letter Grek (after which it was clearly named), armed with a computer-controlled laser cannon, and could transport up to 50 troops, with minimal cargo on the side. The crew amounted to a pilot and co-pilot. Grek-class shuttles were often stationed aboard Nebulon-B frigates when in the Imperial forces.
